question: You are looking for part-time work. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letterintroduce yourselfsay what skills and work experience you haveexplain the sort of job you are looking forYou should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter in connection with the opportunity to a part-time job.

Let me start by presenting myself, as I have recently moved to this town from Toronto and I do not have many contacts here. I am a single woman who lives downtown and loves a fast-paced working environment.

Regarding my previous work experience, I was a tutor in my master's program, where I helped undergraduate students with calculus and statistics. Due to this fact, I have good communication skills and I consider myself a team-oriented person.

As to the job opportunities that I am interested in, I would like to kindly ask for positions related to data analysis roles. More specifically, I am looking for junior or analyst positions in data science in order to better develop myself in this growing field. Please let me know if you need any further information.
I am looking forward to a positive response.
